comment: Nee consistency ki oka 🙏, slides leni anni subjects ki nee notes le. Nee handwriting ki koncham tips cheppava plzz😂😂, naavi sagam attendence lu nuvve vesintavemo. All the best mari🤜.
name: ASVS Pradeep Reddy

comment: You are one of the most dedicated  and intelligent person I know. Yes manaki dedication ravadam kastame but once you do give your best ra don't ever lose that spirit.Future lo kuda ide dedication to IAS ayipo bro twaraga. And sorry for all the times I scared you because I got scared of those dogs 🙂
name: kanishka padamata

comment: You are such a calm😌, sweet girl. Manam mayuri lo  meet ayyam appudu nik vunna dedication adhi peaks. Nik vunna aa padathadhi, plan, vision ki mem picholam ayyam. All the best for your future.
name: Oruganti Pavani
